actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Reported to House from the Committee on Armed Services with amendment, H. Rept. 93-934.
Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.
Committee on Armed Services discharged in Senate.
Measure passed Senate, amended, in lieu of S. 2999.
Conference report filed in House, H. Rept. 93-1064.
House agreed to conference report, roll call #269 (354-14).

official_title: An Act to authorize appropriations during the fiscal year 1974 for procurement of aircraft, missiles, naval vessels, tracked combat vehicles, and other weapons and research, development, test and evaluation for the Armed Forces, and to authorize construction at certain installations, and for other purposes.
short_title: Department of Defense Supplemental Appropriation Authorization Act

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Department of Defense Supplemental Appropriation Authorization Act - =Title I: Procurement= - Enumerates authorized appropriations during fiscal year 1974 for the use of the Armed Forces of the United States for procurement of aircraft, missiles, naval vessels, tracked combat vehicles, and other weapons authorized by law. =Title II: Research, Development, Test and Evaluation= - Enumerates authorized appropriations for the fiscal year 1974 for the use of the Armed Forces of the United States for research, development, test and evaluation. =Title III: Military Construction= - Authorizes the appropriation of not in excess of $3,866,000 during the fiscal year 1974 for maintenance of real property in support of military family housing. =Title IV: General Provisions= - Provides that no volunteer for enlistment into the Armed Forces shall be denied enlistment solely because of his not having a high school diploma.

titles.title: Department of Defense Supplemental Appropriation Authorization Act

A bill to authorize appropriations during the fiscal year 1974 for procurement of aircraft, missiles, naval vessels, tracked combat vehicles, and other weapons and research, development, test and evaluation for the Armed Forces, and to authorize construction at certain installations.

An Act to authorize appropriations during the fiscal year 1974 for procurement of aircraft, missiles, naval vessels, tracked combat vehicles, and other weapons and research, development, test and evaluation for the Armed Forces, and to authorize construction at certain installations, and for other purposes.
